errors.adBlocker: It seems your ad blocker is blocking GitHub login. Please try disabling your ad blocker or add github.com to your whitelist.
errors.general: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again later.
errors.provider: An error occurred while signing in with {0}. Please try again later.
errors.multipleAccounts: You have already signed in with a different method. Your accounts have been automatically linked.

auth.githubAdBlockerWarning: Note: Ad blockers may prevent GitHub login. If login fails, please disable your ad blocker.
